description: Focus Indicator Refinement: Removed poster scaling animation on focus and restored clean focus outline that wraps tightly around poster images only (not title text)
Cast Photos: Added circular mask overlay for cast member photos with improved default scaling
Detail Screen Buttons: Buttons now properly lose background color when focus moves to different rows
A-Z Letter Picker: Restored alphabet navigation in library views with re-integrated alpha filtering
Music Library Overhaul: Now shows all music items (albums, artists, songs) by default with comprehensive filtering options including All Music, Albums, Artists, Songs, and Favorite variants
Music Library Sorting: Added extensive sorting options including Name, Album, Artist, Date Added, Release Date, and Rating (with ascending/descending support)
Music Library Fix: Fixed sorting and filtering functionality that was causing crashes and infinite loading
Live TV: Enhanced validation checks and improved trickplay handling for live TV playback
Library Loading: Implemented pagination and error handling for item loading to fix libraries that loaded forever or not at all
Code Quality: Removed unused functions, cleaned up debug statements, and improved error handling across multiple components
Special thanks to the Jellyfin Roku upstream project and all contributors!
author: Mr Moonfin - @RadicalMuffinMan on GitHub
